title: Clopidogrel
summary: Clopidogrel, sold under the brand name Plavix among others,[2] is an antiplatelet medication used to reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke in those at high risk.[4] It is also used together with aspirin in heart attacks and following the placement of a coronary artery stent (dual antiplatelet therapy).[4] It is taken by mouth.[4] Its effect starts about two hours after intake and lasts for five days.[4]
